We then use the information to compile reports and to help us improve our site.
We will continue to process your information under this basis until you withdraw consent or it is determined your consent no longer exists.
Like many services, Google Analytics uses first-party cookies to track visitor interactions as in our case, where they are used to collect information about how visitors use our site.
We will retain your Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfil the purposes outlined in this Privacy Notice unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
